name: 3rd International Conference on Spine and Spinal Disorders
content: With enormous delight, Allied Academies welcomes everyone from around the globe to the "International Conference on Spine and Spinal Disorders " which will be held from August 30-31, 2018, in London, UK. Theme "Exploration and Innovations Which Contribute Hand Towards Curing and Understanding The Diverse Aspects Of Spine and Spinal Disorders", which will cover an extensive variety of basically vital aspects related to spinal health, spine geriatrics, spine disorder management and advances in the spine and central nervous system related research. Target Audience: Business delegates, Industrial Leaders, Spine Researchers, CEOs and R&D Heads from Industries, Directors, Spine specialists, Neurologists, Neurosurgeons, Chiropractors, Head of Department, Professors, and Students from academia in the research on Spine. Connect us: Website: http://spine.alliedacademies.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Spine2018Event Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/131271021029357/ LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/spine-conference-3b5443163/ Scientific Sessions:- Session on: Spine and Spinal Cord Session On: Spine Surgery and Spine Therapy Session On: Neuroanatomy and Spine Session On: Spinal Injury and Spine Fracture Session On: Osteoporosis in Spine and Spine Arthritis Session On: Spine Disorders and Spinal Abnormalities Session On: Spine Birth Defects Session On: Spine Diseases-Myelopathy, Spondylitis and Scoliosis Session On: Spinal Cord Tumor and Brain Tumor Session On: Spine Fusion- Session On: Spine Health and Spine Infection Session On: Neuro-Oncology and CNS Session On: Spinal Injection Session On: Neuroimmunological Disorders Session On: Stroke- Session On: Cognitive and Behavioral Neurology Session On: Neurorehabilitation and Neuro Nursing Session On: Novel Neurotherapeutics, Neuropharmaceuticals, and Diagnostics Session On: Clinical Trials and Case Reports in Spine and Spinal Disorders
